column4: that package seems to be broken
should I remove it from cache and try again?
now libdvdcss2 shows up as installed, however if I try to remove it, then I get "0 packages upgraded, 0 newly installed, 0 to remove"
you haven't medipuntu-repo in your sources anymore?
sudo aptitude update and then look at "apt-cache policy libdvdcss2"
the repo is missing, trying to reinstall it fails
the command I'm using is supposed to do that for me
